name: A Kittypet's Adventure
description:
Experience a journey of a kittypet who wants to be free in the forest. Now they must prove their worth to a skeptical clan. Will they prove their worth? Will they die? Find out by playing this game!

Game time: 5-10 minutes

This is made with Bitsy, a game making program by Adam Le Doux ! You can find it here!: https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy

Feel free to give feedback! If you could also make let-plays on this game, that would be great!

This was actually a side project, that's why it's so short! 

Thank You!

-DatKewlKat

Concept of Warrior cats by Erin Hunter
